Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: The user lower's the opponent's Attack by one stage whenever it enters the battlefield.

Abilities.Name: Moxie
Abilities.Description: The user's Attack is increased by one stage whenever it knocks out another Pokemon.

Moves.Name: Zen Headbutt
Moves.Description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch.

Moves.Name: Dragon Claw
Moves.Description: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws to inflict damage.

Moves.Name: Crunch
Moves.Description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

Moves.Name: Dual Wingbeat
Moves.Description: The user slams the target with its wings to inflict damage. The target is hit twice in a row.

Moves.Name: Dragon Breath
Moves.Description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Moves.Name: Hurricane
Moves.Description: The user attacks by wrapping the target in a fierce wind. This may also confuse the target.

Moves.Name: Earthquake
Moves.Description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.

Moves.Name: Dragon Dance

Abilities.Name: Sand Stream
Abilities.Description: The user creates a Sandstorm that lasts for 5 turns when it enters the battlefield.

Abilities.Name: Unnerve
Abilities.Description: Prevents the opponent from using its Held Berry.

Moves.Description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.

Moves.Name: Stone Edge
Moves.Description: The user stabs the target with sharpened stones. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

Moves.Name: Bite
Moves.Description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

Moves.Description: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws to inflict damage.

Moves.Name: Leer
Moves.Description: The user gives opposing Pokémon an intimidating leer that lowers their Defense stats.
